description: "The route of W.R.D. Beckett between Bangkok and Saigon, partly along the Mekong River, is marked on this map, along with trade routes, police posts, mines (copper, iron, gold), and products (the spice cardamom, and resin benzoin (‘Gumbenjamin’))."
title: "Map to illustrate Mr. W.R.D. Beckett's route, Nov. 1891-April 1892 [cartographic material]."
